title: The Terrible Secret of Turtle Bay
episode_desc: Dr. Venture, his teen sons Hank and Dean, and their bodyguard Brock head to New York to unveil Dr. Venture's new invention. They are pursued by a ninja intent on acquiring the device.
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: Dia de los Dangerous
episode_desc: Dr. Venture and his family are in Mexico, where the boys get kidnapped by the Monarch's henchmen. Brock goes on a rampage to get them back and Dr. Venture wakes up in a bathtub of ice to find he has no kidneys.
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: Careers in Science
episode_desc: Dubbed the Ninth Wonder of the World, Jonas Venture's space station, Gargantua-1, has developed a problem, and Dr. Thaddeus Venture must fix his father's creation.
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: Home Insecurity
episode_desc: Brock goes on a wilderness retreat, and gets more than he bargained for when he encounters the Army searching for something. Meanwhile, the Venture family retreats to the panic room when the forces of both The Monarch and Baron Ünderbheit attack.
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: The Incredible Mr. Brisby
episode_desc: Dr. Venture takes the X1 to "Brisbyland" for a meeting with the theme park owner Roy Brisby. But the boys get kidnapped by the "Orange County Liberation Front" and Brock and his former lover and secret agent Molotov Cocktease mount a rescue.
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: Eeney, Meeney, Miney... Magic!
episode_desc: The boys discover a dangerous pod in the lab that projects your fantasies, thus trapping you inside. Dr. Byron Orpheus is introduced as well as his daughter, Trianna, whom Dean becomes enamored with immediately.
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: Ghosts of the Sargasso
episode_desc: Dr. Venture and his family encounter pirates while trying to recover an old crashed aircraft made by Dr. Jonas Venture decades earlier.
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: Ice Station Impossible
episode_desc: Pete White, Master Billy Quizboy, and Dr. Venture are recruited by their old college professor, Dr. Richard Impossible, to work for him doing super-science at his remote arctic lab. But when Hank is infected by one of Dr. Impossible's old serums, Brock must race to locate the lab and save Hank's life.
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: Mid-Life Chrysalis
episode_desc: While trying to relive his younger days, Dr. Venture is seduced by Dr. Girlfriend in disguise as part of The Monarch's evil plan. Brock learns he has to renew his license to kill.
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: Are You There God, It's Me, Dean
episode_desc: While Brock and Hank are held hostage by The Monarch, Master Billy Quizboy and Pete White are called in to help diagnose a mysterious painful illness afflicting Dean.
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: Tag-Sale: You're It!
episode_desc: To raise much-needed cash, Dr. Venture holds a yard sale for his father's old, unwanted super-science equipment and inventions. Brock and other agents from the Office of Secret Intelligence maintain security as many of Venture's arch-nemeses attend, but The Monarch has other plans.
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: Past Tense
episode_desc: Hank and Dean learn about Brock and Dr. Venture's early days as they attend a funeral for Mike Sorayama, an old college buddy they used to tease. But the funeral proves to be a ruse by Sorayama to exact revenge for their torment.
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: The Trial of the Monarch
episode_desc: The Monarch finds himself on trial for a murder, but it soon becomes clear that the "Guild of Calamitous Intent" may be behind the whole thing.
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: Return to Spider-Skull Island
episode_desc: While Hank and Dean run away from home to seek their independence, an old enemy of Dr. Venture's, long thought destroyed, returns seeking vengeance.
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: A Very Venture Christmas
episode_desc: It's Christmas and the Ventures are having their annual party. But the festivities are interrupted by the Dean who accidentally summons a Christmas demon, and the Monarch who plans to blow up the Venture home.
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

episode_desc: Life goes on after the tragic deaths of Hank and Dean. Meanwhile, the Monarch deals with life "inside" but you can't keep a good criminal mastermind down. But will King Gorilla prove to be his greatest ally, or his worst betrayer?
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: Hate Floats

show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: Assassinanny 911

show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: Escape to the House of Mummies Part II
episode_desc: Team Venture find themselves trapped in the clutches of a bloodthirsty Egyptian cult and their time machine. Dr. Venture narrowly escapes and teams up with Master Billy Quizboy and Pete White, but promptly forgets to mount a rescue. So it's up to Brock and a pantheon of history's greatest men to find another way out.
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

episode_desc: While a mysterious extra-terrestrial Inquisitor evaluates human culture, Dr. Venture discovers an old video recording from his father informing him he must, before tomorrow night, locate and assemble the hidden pieces to a device that will save the Earth from certain doom.
show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

show_desc: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: From the Ladle to the Grave: The Shallow Gravy Story
episode_desc: See the Venture Family as you've never seen them before: in an 11 minute documentary-style animated UNCENSORED special. Follow the meteoric rise, the equally meteoric fall, and the decidedly un-meteor-like second coming of the most important band Hank Venture, Dermott Fictel and H.E.L.P.eR. robot have ever been in--Shallow Gravy. If you're hungry for rock, then open wide--because here comes a ladle of heavy metal fire and metaphoric meat drippings!

episode_desc: Monarch and 21 train their first arch as part of their induction into the Guild; Dr. Mrs. the Monarch deals with the mole.

title: The Unicorn in Captivity

title: The Terminus Mandate
episode_desc: Mrs. Monarch finds out from the Guild Council charter that they must either retire as villains, and commit one last arch each, or leave the Guild Council. Dr. Venture tries to get laid by a black widower.

title: The Forecast Manufacturer
episode_desc: On behalf the Guild, Mr. and Mrs. Monarch and 21 go to take out the PP leader. Dr. Venture and Billy go investigate a stolen Guild weather machine. Hank goes out to rescue his girlfriend.
